name: Artillery (zoom377)
description:
Enemy forces are approaching! Make use of your limited ammunition to destroy as many foes as you can before you are overwhelmed.

Note: If game doesn't display properly try to resize the web page (ctrl - or ctrl +)

Controls:

Hold to charge cannon and release to fire.

ActionNumpadAlternativeFire/Menu select5Space bar
Rotate cannon counter-clockwise4Left arrowRotate cannon clockwise6Right arrowMenu up8Up arrowMenu down2Down arrowRestart.R

Made by Tommy Evans for Nokia3310 jam #4 using Unity.
